strings:
<voice_0x0100096F><se_low>*: Wha ha ha! Surprise, surprise! Meet Geyzer!
I am the master of this waterfall!

<voice_0x01000970><se_low><se_low>Geyzer: Oh, how long it's been!
How many people have gone and come!

<voice_0x01000971><se_low>Geyzer: Ten long years and more I've waited! Ten years,
I tell you! All the time hoping for the left one...
I mean, the right one to come...

<voice_0x01000972><se_low>Geyzer: But enough with the introductions!
Now for the troment of muth!

<voice_0x01000973><se_low>Geyzer: Does this brystal call...er, crystal ball belong
to you?
<voice_0x01000976><se_low>Geyzer: No!? But, I was sure you were the one!

<voice_0x01000977><se_low>Geyzer: Oh, the lone, longly years! Ah, go, then!
My wait continues!

<voice_0x01000974><se_low>Geyzer: Ha ha ha haaa! At last! At last we feet,
mace to mace, you halfwit human!

<voice_0x01000975><se_low>Geyzer: Now I'll teach you a moron! Argh!
I mean a lesson you won't forget!

<voice_0x0100097A><se_low>Geyzer: Wah ha ha ha haaah!
Back again for more of the same, are you!?
You must be a punishment for glutton!

<voice_0x0100097B><se_low>Geyzer: As you wish!
You'll defeat me as many times as I like!
Er, I mean, I'll defeat you!

<voice_0x0100097C><se_low>Geyzer: Argh! The pain, the pain! Oh, my old wound!
Ever since I got this, I've not been right quite.
<voice_0x0100097D><se_low>Geyzer: And it's all because of you!
<voice_0x0100097E><se_low>Geyzer: What!? You don't know what I'm talking about...? Then you...
<voice_0x0100097F><se_low>Geyzer: You're not the true owner of this crystal ball! No! The shame, the shame!
<voice_0x01000980><se_low>Geyzer: So strong! Strong enough to withstand my fearsome might! You are no tortune-feller!

<voice_0x01000981><se_low>Geyzer: Wait! Could you be...?
The waterfall rears many humours, you know.
<voice_0x01000982><se_low>Geyzer: I hear that a castle called Trodain has been cursed. That it was run over...overrun by thorns. And that only one person inside survived.
<voice_0x01000983><se_low>Geyzer: He set off on a journey, leading a corse and hart with a lone driver.
<voice_0x01000984><se_low>Geyzer: As I thought! That was you!

<voice_0x01000985><se_low>Geyzer: I don't know what you want with this
crystal ball...

<voice_0x01000986><se_low>Geyzer: But it's yours now.
I accept dehands...
Or is it defeat?

<voice_0x01000987><se_low>Geyzer: Either way, I have mothing nore to say. Here,
take it! You defeated me. It belongs to you, now.
<Cap><hero> takes <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_1> and puts it in the bag.
<voice_0x01000988><se_low>Geyzer: One last thing! Should you meet the true owner of this crystal ball, tell him this from me!
<voice_0x01000989><se_low>Geyzer: DON'T THROW THINGS IN THE FALLWATER!

<voice_0x0100098A><se_low>Geyzer: So, ware thee fell! Oh, the pain, the pain!
The pain of my old wound!
<voice_0x01000978><se_low>Geyzer: What? You again? I, Geyzer, am the master of this waterfall, I tell you!
<voice_0x01000979><se_low>Geyzer: Now then, have I asked you this bethree...er, before!?
